name: Terra Luna
description:
Terra Luna was created during Global Game Jam 2019 and relays the story of a lonely astronaut in space. The theme of the jam is what home means to you, and thus the goal of the game is to make the base feel more like home. The player is able to walk around the base interacting with various objects in order to increase their familiarity score. As the score increases, the music will slowly change from a more somber and melancholy tune  to a more cheerful one and the color of the environment will slowly fade in. 

The game is still unfinished, with the color changing environment as well as periodic messages from home have yet to be implemented. 

Directions:

WASD to move, QE to change the camera angle, SPACE to interact, and ESC or P to pause the game. 

Enjoy!
